meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>forehead</radical> is in the <radical>sun</radical>, and you start seeing those creatures with <radical>lid</radical>s for heads and  <radical>fins</radical> for feet again. Where on earth did they come from? They must have come from the <kanji>underworld</kanji>. Nothing like that exists in this life.
readingMnemonic: The sun is unusually hot for the month of <reading>May</reading> (めい), which must be why those underworld creatures are running around.
